data.title: CBS - Copenhagen Business School
data.meta_description: My main research interests are in the fields of sustainable consumer behavior and economics, including health, well-being and environmental sustainability.
data.text:
My main research interests are in the fields of sustainable consumer behavior and economics, including health, well-being and environmental sustainability. Previously part of the Nudge-it Project, I focused on healthy food choices using experimental and survey methods.

I am a member of the Consumer and Behavioural Insights Group (CBIG) at the CBS Sustainability centre.
